name: Lidle Idle Planet
description:
Lidle Idle Planet

On this small Idle game you do what you do in all dle games!
You click on the Planet, Generate points, and automate the process
by upgrading and and unlocking various things.

What you will Get:

I made this game in 3 weeks, it has a pretty simple artstyle with manly white and purple colors, calm music(not made by me).
You will get around 2-5 Hours of semi active gameplay, or 2-3 days of jumping in every few hours.

Hope you will have fun!

Game Content:

-6 diffrent upgrade
   -Mountain
   -Satelite
   -Rocket
   -Meteor
   -Moon
   -Dyson Sphere

-small Tutorial
-Offline earnings
